summary: An Irish fisherman discovers a woman in his fishing net whom his precocious daughter believes to be a selkie.
cast: Colin Farrell|Alicja Bachleda|Dervla Kirwan|Alison Barry|Marion O'Dwyer|Tony Curran|Mary O'Shea|Gemma Reeves|Stephen Rea|Norma Sheahan|Emil Hostina|Conor Power|Olwyn Hanley|Brendan McCormack|Mark Doherty|Peter Gowen|Helen Norton|Don Wycherley|Gertrude Montgomery|Reese O'Shea|Sharon Shannon|Dashiel Jordan|Ante Novakovic
keywords: celtic mythology|character name as title|reference to sherlock holmes|child uses a wheelchair|child in jeopardy
title: Ondine, la leyenda del mar
